comment: Hi! what day and time will the webinar be ? and would it be possible to join? many thanks, Matteo
amr:
# ::snt Hi! what day and time will the webinar be ? and would it be possible to join? many thanks, Matteo
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hi
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / day
                        :time-of (w / webinar))
                  :op2 (t / time
                        :time-of w)
                  :domain (a3 / amr-unknown))
            :op2 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (j / join-04
                        :ARG1 w)
                  :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown)))
      :snt3 (t2 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Matteo"))
            :quant (m2 / many)))
